verbs.description: The American embassy [V: is] being relocated from Tel Aviv on May 14 following US President Donald Trump 's recognition of Jerusalem as Israel 's capital .
The American embassy is [V: being] relocated from Tel Aviv on May 14 following US President Donald Trump 's recognition of Jerusalem as Israel 's capital .
[ARG1: The American embassy] is being [V: relocated] [ARGM-DIR: from Tel Aviv] [ARGM-TMP: on May 14] [ARGM-TMP: following US President Donald Trump 's recognition of Jerusalem as Israel 's capital] .
The American embassy is being relocated from Tel Aviv on May 14 [V: following] [ARG2: US President Donald Trump 's recognition of Jerusalem as Israel 's capital] .
